meanings.definition: A polygon with nine sides and nine angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew several nonagons in my geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The playground had colorful nonagons painted on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The nonagons at the math fair were quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was adorned with sparkling nonagons.
meanings.sent5: The field was filled with nonagons of all sizes, creating a mesmerizing sight.
